name: Sub Commander
description: Sub Commander is a free, independently developed roguelike submarine simulator with an emphasis on realism and freedom of choice. Originally, the game was envisioned to be a kind of cross between Dwarf Fortress and the film K-19 The Widowmaker but it is rapidly growing to a full featured submarine warfare simulator. Eventually I plan to simulate all aspects of cold war era naval and aerial combat, so the player's submarine will be in the midst of a dynamic, procedurally generated global war.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Black Hill Fortress MP017
description: Tiger Tank 59 is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, and defeat all the enemy tanks.

name: Maze Escape
description: This game is to escape the maze while avoiding zombies and obstacles. Use the item and remember the way you came to escape from the maze. Good luck.

name: Death Box
description: Death Box is a labyrinth horror game where the goal is to escape the death box and manage to survive. You have to find the exit of a huge maze of secret rooms and doors without getting caught by zombies and traps. There are 2 types of enemies: fast and slow zombies.

name: Ride 3: Naked Bikes Pack
description: Ride 3: Naked Bikes Pack expands your garage with new content. This package contains 5 exclusive bikes and a new Volume with 10 additional events.

name: Dungeon Defenders: Talay Mining Complex Mission Pack
description: Among the sparkling gemstones of Talay, a set of long-buried Eternia Crystals have been unearthed. But the volcanic activity of the mine is rapidly rising and its imminent eruption threatens to destroy both friend and foe. Protect the Eternia Crystals from the horde as you contend with the dangers of the mine itself!

name: Neon Knight
description: Old-school FPS in a neon package with lasers and robots! Fast paced action, bunny hopping and rocket jumping.

name: Beat 'Em Up
description: The Beat 'Em Up game is a complete package of boxing and karate. The whole game is designed in a story mode that you will Have to fight against the gangsters of city by applying your boxing kung Fu skills. This kung Fu game is advanced type of fighting games. Beat 'Em Up is in wait for you.

name: CarX Drift Racing Online: Midnight
description: CarX Drift Racing Online: Midnight is a DLC for the simulator game CarX Drift Racing Online, featuring virtual drift racing on mountain roads and narrow city streets. It's quite challenging for both rookie and experienced racers. Front lights cutting through darkness are your only companion on mountain roads and narrow city streets. Discover drifting again and enjoy new atmospheres for your favorite locations at night with CarX Drift Racing Online: Midnight.

name: Tiger Tank
description: It's a tank battle game from a top view.Players will drive various types of tanks in World War II, galloping across the battlefield.

name: Sinister Halloween: Asylum
description: As a journalist, you receive a secret email from Mountain Peaks Asylum in Sinister Halloween: Asylum, a DLC for Sinister Halloween. A little girl is reported lost trick or treating nearby and as a reporter, you investigate the area on Halloween Night.

name: Worlds of Magic: Titans
description: Let loose the Titans, the most powerful creatures in the Worlds of Magic and try to defeat them or coerce to join your empire!

name: Sleep
description: The main character (Jill) is often tormented by nightmares. Her friends asked her to look after their house while they were away. That's when her real nightmare begins. You will have to feel the history of her nightmares and understand what is really behind it.

name: Last Shot
description: A Sci-Fi Variety Online Multiplayer First Person Shooter presented to you as a Galactic Combat Gameshow. Hosted by Specter-473 from Zeta-Reticuli and Skashkar the Conqueror of Worlds as they bring you the engaging play-by-play commentary!

name: My Lust Wish
description: My Lust Wish is an Adult LifeSim RPG Sandbox. The game tells about a young girl Ashley, who came to a small sweet town to study at university. Ashley will have to survive in this city on her own, earn money, buy food and things, study at the university and etc.

name: Lab Escape
description: In Lab Escape, you can defeat robots and bosses while using a jet pack, a Exploding disc launcher, a blaster, and a shotgun!

name: Neo-Zero
description: The role-playing game set in a 1990s computer simulation.

name: Architectus
description: ARCHiTECTUS is a sandbox game about planning, building, furnishing and exploring of constructions.

name: Keezeh: The Spector of Time
description: Fight your way through waves of hostile tribal warriors, dangerous creatures and explore uncharted islands while trying to reach your spaceship in this indie adventure / RPG game.

name: Dying: 1983
description: Dying 1983 is the new adventure from the Dying franchise. In this first person puzzle game you will operate the protagonist to freely explore the 3D scenes, using a variety of props collected to solve one puzzle after another, ultimately discovering the hidden truth behind the scenes.

name: Low-Key: A Dope Game
description: Action Adventure. RPG. Strong Language. Adult Content.

name: District 99
description: Unidentified objects began to fall to the ground, from which aggressive monsters emerged. Your task is to clear one of these areas from enemies.

name: VR Rescue of Girls
description: This is a VR horror game with the theme of secret room adventure. Players can wear a helmet to enter the underground secret room and experience the thrilling game of escape from the secret room.

name: MaJiang
description: Sichuan Mahjong, also known as Chengdu Mahjong, or Bloody Mahjong, is popular in Sichuan, Chongqing, and Guizhou, and is a form of entertainment. The core is to hit the door, wind and rain, count, fight to the end, check the bargaining, check the pig.

name: Super CosmoJet
description: Super CosmoJet is a 2D physics-based action space game. Pilot your ship through 8 procedurally generated star systems on your career as a commercial space captain. Transport passengers, deliver cargo with your tractor beam, mine asteroids for gold or destroy enemies for bounty payments!

name: Analog Party Sim
description: A Pixel Art, 2D Casual Arcade game that takes you back to a time before video chat parties when getting drunk with friends was less Digital and more Analog.

name: Totally Reliable Adventure Party
description: Action RPG meets a totally reliable ragdoll physics sandbox. Gather your clumsiest friends and embark on the most inefficient quest in the history of dark fantasy. Spooky dungeons, shiny loot and giant bosses await!

name: endlessCorona
description: The prophecies of Nostradamus, the 2000 effect, the Maya? They predicted the end of the world and “nothing” happened and now, without anyone predicting it, the end of the world has come! Do we make a record? let's see who can last longer without getting infected ... Join the world competition!

name: Inbox Unbox
description: A worryingly recursive puzzle game about pushing boxes into other boxes. Rearrange the structure of the world itself to forge a path to the exit!

name: The Legend of Cesar
description: A super fun game made by just one person, your goal is to kill as many zombies as you can and try to survive in the forest that surrounds you.

name: End War RTS 2
description: A 3D modern real-time war game, realistic 3D style, the classic RTs of the second-generation continuation of End War RTS, stimulates the fast-paced sense of attack

name: Allied Ambush
description: Defend your city from the onslaught of the dark army. A game of skill and strategy. Deploy machine gunners, snipers and towers. move your men into towers to increase their shooting range. Three challenging levels to conquer.

name: Killing a Superstar
description: Killing a Superstar brings a new VR interactive experience with immersive sense of drama. The story will start in different spaces at the same time. Viewers can use the map function in the film to freely switch among different scenes. The viewers need to answer the key questions to solve crimes.

name: Fort Craft
description: Fort Craft is a unique chance to become a imperial age royal craftsman. Build your own Fort and re-arrange them, at your own directions. Craft, rebuild and be prepared to manage forts !

name: Trail of the Damned
description: Choose your own nightmare as you explore the stark world of Damnation. Struggle to survive against unnerving creatures, vicious bandits, and punishing elements! Can you endure the trail, uncover the secrets, and unlock Salvation? Many try - most just die.

name: Space Plane
description: Short, turn based puzzle game drawn and coded by Artur Petrov. His second project after the Ink Plane.

name: Batsu!
description: Compete in hilarious improv challenges! Draw Suggestion Cards from the audience. The player that performs the worst gets punished... Japanese game show style!

name: An Absolutely Not Suspicious Cabin in the Woods
description: In a cabin in the woods, his girlfriend is possessed by The Book of the Dead (or "Necronomicon") that summons monsters in the mist that come in increasingly creepy waves. Will you be able to survive this retro battle against evil that mixes top-down action-rpg with arcade?

name: Space Squadron
description: Earth's last hope is in your hands, take control of the lone spaceship and protect Earth from alien swarms. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies.

name: Temporary Girl
description: A girl wants you to buy her food, wash her hair and buy her new clothes when you think of her. No matter where you are, We hope to give you a girl like this to make you happy! So, the pet girl was born here. She is sunny. And a little bit of a character.

name: Explory Story
description: Play as a world famous detective who is stuck inside one of his own works! Be careful and watch your step. The words on the page can come to life.

name: Captain Frogger
description: One day when a Gorilla was taking a walk, a family of Frogs jumped toward the Gorilla. The Frogs just wanted to hug their good friend Gorilla, but the surprised Gorilla tried to repel the Frogs. The Gorilla and the Frogs are best friends, though!

name: Dahlia no Wakudeki: Danchi-zuma Akiko ga Ochiru Jijou
description: Sin descripción

name: Sheep Island
description: You've get a no people island. Then there is only one thing to do. Use your hands to increase the number of sheep.

name: Let's Hobbee
description: Imagine beautiful place full coloured flowers and busy bees and You - the Master of Beekeepers - ruling this small universe. Build hives, collect resources, learn how to be better, develop the business, win the price!

name: Footballer
description: Plunge into the wonderful world of football together with millions of players from all over the world. Create and upgrade your character. Play online with friends in 1vs1, 2vs2, 3vs3, 4vs4 matches where every player is a real player. Find your comrades in our discord server and see you on the field!

name: Velocity VR Battle Royal
description: Spawn into my simulation, fight for your life until one remains. Destroy everything in your path, slice all in your way, climb into action, and punch out the competition.

name: Pakucchauzo!
description: Sin descripción

name: Ero Shooter
description: +18 top-down space shoot 'em up. As the new commander of Eros your duty is to destroy all your enemies unit and to keep your crew satisfied.

name: Gude! Jump n Run
description: Challenging 2D Platformer featuring a glowing Cat.

name: Woo Wop Da Bam
description: Woo Wop Da Bam is a battle royale game where the player uses flying cars that emit barriers to crash other players.

name: Serene
description: Serene is a simplistic, bright and challenging puzzle game with easy to understand movement focused around understanding and completing puzzles.

name: Super Vili
description: Help minister of health destroy deadly virus!

name: Chess Knights: Eldritch Hunter
description: Choose your hero and enter the dungeon in this otherworldly puzzle game.

name: Azure Domain
description: Azure Domain is an aerial dogfighting game with a huge world, intense action, and a deeply rich story. Between ancient goddesses, extradimensional beings, maniacal dictators and corrupt leaders, it's hard to simply be a fighter pilot.

name: WoodHeart
description: Explore a vast world in this 2D top-down Zelda-like adventure. Find treasures as you slash enemies, swing them around, and throw them at the bosses. Talk and laugh with people, animals, and even tree stumps. With no destined fate, will you slay the evil demon Firerom or just jump in puddles?

name: Jury Trial
description: In this law simulation RPG you join a group of innocence lawyers. Set in a fictional country deeply divided by racial profiling, prejudice and social injustice it’s your job to find a jury who’s willing to listen. Study case material, discover new evidence and convince the jury in the court of law.

name: Monolith VR
description: Try and look for a mysterious metal monolith that's full of riddles.

name: Pipe Dreamin' VR: The Big Easy
description: Pipe Dreamin' VR: The Big Easy is a single player casual puzzle game set in the chaotic, watery and silly world of subterranean New Orleans. As a player, you will use custom VR mechanics to catch raining pipes, avoid the rising waters and build unique pipe structures to escape flooding rooms.

name: Fun Christmas Santa VR
description: You have been chosen by Santa to assist him for this Christmas ! You'll have plenty things to take care of, like making toys, playing snowball, but also solve a big problem that arrived in the north pole that could compromise this Christmas !

name: Maze: A VR Adventure
description: Maze: A VR Adventure is a roguelite horror game. Lose yourself into the darkness of a procedurally generated maze. Rely on your sense of direction and your magical skills to get out alive. Two types of locomotion systems available to meet the player's needs. HTC Vive or Oculus Rift are required.

name: Wild Jigsaw VR
description: Wild Jigsaw VR is a relaxing casual game. Rebuild the world, see animals in their natural scale. Discover new realms and their secrets. See how animals look and behave. Imbibe yourself in nature.

name: Beach Relaxation VR
description: Escape to your own private island in virtual reality where you can relax, paint and build sandcastles.

name: Cyberspace VR
description: Cyberspace VR is a Fast-Paced Tower Defense / FPS Hybrid VR Game set in a Futuristic Dystopia where humans and AI Join Forces to save what remains. Fun and Active Combats combined with Strategic RPG Progression, all while you discover our Cinematic Universe through a mesmerizing Storytelling.

name: VR Hentai Cat
description: Would you like to enjoy erotic plays with adorable catgirls in VR?

name: VRKraft
description: Explore the Three-Worlds and stop the ascend of the ancient dragon Tetrac in this action packed online VRRPG. Level up your character and play with or against other players.

name: Dinosaur Hunting Patrol 3D Jurassic VR
description: Enjoy hunting dinosaurs and protect primates in a Virtual Reality game. Dangerous T-Rex, Spinosaurus, Raptor, Triceratops, Brachiosaurus, Pteranodon, Stegosaurus, Dimetrodon, Paradophosaurus. With weapons and missions !

name: VR Hiroshima 1945
description: This is a sad story, a tragic moment. In the summer of 1945, atomic weapons were used for the first time in human history.

name: VR Girls' Room in Darkness
description: In 2008, a girl named Kimmy disappeared strangely. Her parents searched for her for a long time but failed to find her, so they left this sad land. Twelve years later, you found this uninhabited house during an accidental trip.

name: Dinner Etiquette VR
description: Asynchronous VR game (Headset & Desktop): Baby vs Dad in an epic battle to teach a child dinner etiquette.

name: MoghVR
description: Mages are as powerful as their imagination.

name: Twistedland VR
description: The Craziest shoot'n'kill VR park you've ever been. Today you are Good Guy in SWAT. Tomorrow you are a bad boy on the Wild West. It's easy in the Twistedland. Just take your friends, choose realm and have fun in this freaking tactical arcade VR team shooter!

name: BeatBox Runner
description: BeatBox Runner is a retro platformer with a twist: switch states to survive its unique series of traps and challenges.

name: Asteroid Blasters
description: Asteroid Blasters is a non-stop action space shooter. Inspired by Asteroids, this game will see you choose between 6 different ships each with their own characteristics and utilize a variety of weapon powerups to eradicate your enemies. Play 2 players to increase your chance of survival.

name: Home Safe and Silent
description: Home Safe and Silent is a survival game with rogue-lite and tabletop board game elements. Scavenge randomly generated locations to help your colony survive. Rotate different game boards to try and gather all of the necessary supplies while using the equipment you find to fight off the dead.

name: Mark One
description: Robots built by humans are retaliating. Step in to dispose rogue robots, defeat powerful foes and save the human race in this sci-fi action shooter.

name: Pumpkin Dog Xtreme
description: Pumpkin Dog Xtreme is a 3D platformer inspired by 3D platforming games from the 90’s. Unique Retro soundtrack, over 24 levels and a boss battles and bonus stages. The game has a large amount of different levels and large number of enemies.

name: Guillotine
description: Guillotine is a multiplayer game of social deduction, with a pinch of survival. You're in a tavern in the woods, but someone is a necromorph hungry for human meat. Guillotine the necromorph, or get eaten alive.

name: Lords of the Darkreign
description: Descend into the sunless lands! A three-way civil war ravages the realm, while an enigmatic order tries to conquer all for their draconic master. Take the role of a lord leading an army, and bring triumph to your cause! Annihilate all who defy you, and stand alone beneath the swirling sky!

name: Double Jump
description: Control a single character with a friend or partner, seeing how in sync you can get your motions. Being in phase will be rewarded, while being clumsy will be punished. I'm sure you have nothing to worry about though if you're always on the same page!

name: The Cartesian Project
description:
The Cartesian Project is a fast-paced first-person 3D platforming game that will pit you against an endless collection of procedurally generated challenges.

You control The Sentinel, a mysterious mechanical walker with unmatched agility and dexterity. You will infiltrate countless facilities and strongholds, stealing the resources you need to fuel your expeditions as you uncover your role in the conflicts surrounding the enigmatic planet of Eridani-C.

name: Baby Dragon Rancher
description: Dragons are famous for their money hoarding and wealth. If only I could use some of that for myself, but adults are too vicious to tame. Baby dragons won't be though! It's time to collect them all! Time to get rich, and maybe I can finally pay off my student loans!

name: Blood War
description: Special forces soldier, left alone behind enemy lines. The fascists blocked his way back to their own. Drown in the blood of these blood-thirsty Nazis. Blood War is a Hardcore platformer that will allow you to help the Nazis lose their lives. Here you will hone your shooting skills to perfection.

name: Taekwondo Demonstration Team Simulator
description: The Taekwondo Demonstration Team Simulator brings you a new experience. You can decorate the demonstration team by configuring the cool Taekwondo movements as a show stage.

name: Kid Detective
description: The Kid Detective! The Murder Mystery RPG game that asks the question,"What's so great about the truth anyway?!?"

name: Tribulation
description: In Santabell City, political intrigue and shadowy organizations have become commonplace. To counter these growing threats enter Sharla, Indira, Kyra, and Liria of the newly-formed Santabell Arbiter Branch in this intricately deep turn-based JRPG.

name: Squaxel
description: Discover, build, destroy, take a walk on flying islands ! That's only one part from all the things that the game can give you !

name: Archery Arena
description: Archery Arena is a third person arcade based shooter with RPG leveling system. Stomp, roll, shoot and slash your way through a horde of enemies and bosses as your work to the final arena and compete for the highscore.

name: Final Hope: The Plot
description: Final Hope: The Plot is a turn-based Tactical RPG with a medieval theme. Create your hero and embark on the odyssey of Uthread, a young adventurer who was born predestined to change the history of his world.

name: GumBall Warrior
description: GumBall Warrior is a 2d shooter puzzle adventure game inspired by the Mega Man games and other tiles. Choose your own path, travel through several strange worlds, as you defeat each of the bosses on each world unlocking new powers and expanding your kingdom.

name: Space Sprinter VR
description: Shake the controller up and down then you will feel like you're running.

name: The Savoury Inspector
description: A silly jaunt into the world of The Savoury Inspector! You the apprentice, the inspector your mentor. Together, embark on a journey to solve the mysterious puzzle of the unsavoury.

name: Task Men
description: Rogue-like Auto-battler game, assemble a party of recruits with unique skills and traits, level them up and slay powerful monsters!

name: Glider Sim
description: Experience the ultimate sensation of gliding through the sky! Built for real glider pilots in mind this simulator is as close to real as it gets. The sim can be played outside VR or inside VR.

name: Ayano the Exorcist
description: The busty exorcist in a skin-tight bodysuit challenges a tentacle dungeon!

name: Wild Gun
description: You are the sheriff. Robbers roam the village and pillage. Your mission is to catch robbers and bounties. Fight them to protect your town.

name: Super Whiplash
description: An online multiplayer vehicular combat game inspired by games like Twisted Metal. Drive a toy car around in a bedroom and pepper your friends with bullets.

name: Caught in Nowhere
description: The vast world of Caught in Nowhere perfectly entwines gorgeous landscapes with haunted, terrifying locations. With an eclectic mix of destinations, players will be glued to their screens in an attempt to discover everything that the world has to offer.

name: Leonardo's Island
description: Leonardo's Island is a video game for PC. Follow the story, discover the mystery of the Island and find the Treasure! It is all about sandbox, exploring, battles and trading with another players. Build your own ship and sell it to other players! Build a flying machine and go to another Island!

name: Nova Genetics
description: Nova Genetics is open-world sci-fi zombie survival game. With focus on survivability/exploration and quick decision making. Should you try to run and live to fight another day or build outposts and fight against threat hordes.

name: Purgatory Overkill
description: "Purgatory Overkill" is a VR shooter and a VR tower defense when you can build turrets and walls to help you fight endless hordes of monsters while you actively participate in the fight with loads of guns.

name: On the Hunt
description: Become a top class hunter polish your shooting skill to perfection!

name: My Cousin the Rogue
description: A simple traditional roguelike with ASCII art where you save the monsters instead of hurting them.

name: Silver Squad: Age of the Vortex
description: Humanity is on the brink of extension; take the place of Captain Edward Stalway and save the World from the forces of the Vortex. Raid enemy bases, steal alien technologies, collect artifacts and shoot robots into tiny piles of scrap.

name: Puzzle Dazzle 3D
description: Puzzle Dazzle is a unique, addictive and breathtaking take on the classic block puzzle game formula. Immerse yourself into the world of puzzle dazzle, each level different from the last one you’ve played. The music, backgrounds and all the animations react to exactly how you play.

name: Crystal Valley
description: In Crystal Valley they explore alien landscapes mine raw materials and build new tools and fight against a large number of enemies.

name: Zeltrus
description: Zeltrus is a fresh take on the puzzle-platformer genre about Obis, a young boy who finds himself trapped in the basement of a building. Help Obis complete challenges, uncover secrets and put an end to this with only his grenades to protect him.

name: Dark Farm
description: "Dark Farm" is an RPG raid game. You have to take care of your garden, which wants to kill you. Grow killer vegetables. Water your garden beds. Defend yourself.

name: Immense Threat
description: Join the chickens in their war for the stolen dignity, and defeat the wicked Consumers!Immense Threat is a classic-style adventure platformer, set in future. Fight and shoot your way through dangerous enemies, and avoid deadly traps on over 20 levels!

name: Lantern Light VR
description: Lantern Light is a relaxing archery dungeon game. Discover enchanting worlds inside the dungeon. The dungeon is Large and you'll need to explore in order to find a way out. Master difficult puzzles. Each room gets more difficult and presents new challenges.

name: Bilal Go!
description: a turn-based puzzle video game

name: Eldritch House
description: Eldritch House is a first person narrative adventure which blends genres and is presented in a 3D comic book style. Players must investigate the strange occurrences of the remote Blake Manor. Ghosts both literal and personal haunt its denizens’ lives. Can you unearth its secrets?

name: Insulated at the bottom
description: Insulated at the bottom - An atmospheric third-person shooter, meet and destroy enemies on your way, cope with difficult platforming and plunge into the atmosphere of an abandoned military base.

name: Tower Defense Hero
description: A game combining tower defense and RPG

name: The Frosted
description: The Frosted is an arcade game where you take a long journey through the Northern Region.Defeat the enemies, solve the puzzles, and upgrade your abilities. Make difficult decisions and gain more power to help Ursula fulfill her wish.

name: Substantia Cana
description: Substantia Cana is an indie, puzzle-platform game with rich story. The game takes place in a stylized, abstract environment.

name: Thin Ice
description: Thin Ice is a point and click adventure game set in the beautiful and mysterious town of Sandy Lake Village. Meet curious characters, solve challenging puzzles and uncover what lies beneath the surface of this idyllic setting.

name: Moon Blob
description: Play as Bob The Blob as you explore and shoot your way through the moons of the Orion Nebula! Defeat the waves of blobs determined to stop your exploration!Legend has it, no one has seen the Black Moon and lived to tell the tale.

name: Simuliator Kupaniia V Fontanie
description: Sin descripción

name: Voxel Tactics
description: Voxel Tactics is a strategy RPG where you take command of a band of plucky heroes as they journey across a vast and dangerous world full of magic, monsters and mighty empires!

name: Element X
description: Element X is a hardcore roguelite bullet hell. Challenge ruthless enemies and claim your high score!

name: Vector Assault 2
description: Fight off waves of enemies to reach the highest score possible.

name: Golf For Fun
description: Golf for fun, is a 2D golf-based game, focused on generating challenging and entertaining players, where you can play precisely crafted maps to test your skills.

name: PC Hockey League
description: PC Hockey League is the newest and best hockey experience brought to PC! Experience intense, action packed 3-on-3 gameplay! Through team work, offensive and defensive skills battle your way to be the best in the league.

name: Brave point kill
description: In this world, you have to play as a brave. You will go to the monster camp, defeat the monsters to get gold coins, and improve yourself to defeat more powerful monsters.

name: Paper Shooter!
description: Are you sick of playing boring FPS zombie games with amazing graphics? Well now you can play Paper Shooter! An endless zombie shooter with top quality hand-drawn graphics from an artist with ZERO skill and beautiful sound design from random objects I found lying around. How long can you survive?

name: Dead Era
description: A Top-Down Zombie Action RPG

name: Seen 2
description: A lonely kid desperately tries to escape his dark world. (Part 2)

name: Bloody Paws: Passion Unleashed
description: Rope-jumping mummies, invisible men, lazy superheroes, and the Frankenstein monster (on roller skates) are out to get you! Control a melodramatic werewolf on a quest to find his missing were-wife in this remake of the 1990 game.

name: Bring Dad Home
description: Your only task is to bring your drunk dad home！

name: ER Pandemic Simulator
description: See what it's like to work at a Hospital Emergency Ward when a pandemic attacks the whole world. Become a doctor: help patients, diagnose them and save their lives. At the same time, try to keep your own.

name: Cyber Dodge
description: Cyber Dodge is a skill-based Runner and a Die & Retry that takes place in Tron's atmosphere.Travel through various levels, master your abilities to overcome the obstacles.

name: Smelted Kin: Inhuman Impact
description: Sci-fi 2D shooter platformer combining the control of a human character and an armored vehicle on the surface of a planet filled with robots and immortal local inhabitants

name: Mithos
description: A top-down Filipino Action-RPG set in medieval Philippines featuring the story of the unsung hero of ancient Philippine mythology and the last moon.

name: Angry Giant
description: Abducted from his tribe, humiliated and tortured by despicable beings, finally free, he is ready for his revenge. He was just a giant, now he is an ANGRY GIANT! Fight going from age to age. Kill enemies. Upgrade your weapons. Use your anger to save the world.

name: Escape Room VR: Vaudeville
description: A single-player, vaudeville-themed VR Escape Room.

name: Miracle world
description: miracle world is a creative game，which is equivalent to 2D minecraft press the left mouse button delete press the right mouse button come and join the game，use your imagination and create your own world with millions of players

name: Pickup Basketball VR
description: Pickup Basketball VR is a multiplayer VR game that lets up to 4 players play in various game modes including 1 v 1, 2 v 2, Horse and 3-point contest. Pickup Basketball VR allows players to compete online with or against friends and players from across the world.

name: Wild Baffo
description: Wild Baffo is a challenging retro arcade shooter that features dynamic gameplay, an intense story, and leaderboards. It provides all the thrills of point-and-shoot arcade classics, at home.

name: The Midnight Eater
description: Enter the skin of Jonathan "Midnight Eater" Lewis and hunt a sinister demon in this horror game.

name: Anima Reaver
description: A 3D sci-fi open world game.

name: AfterTheCloud
description: AfterTheCloud is a Post-Apocalyptic RPG set in 2050. After a pandemic decimated the world, destroying businesses and governments, conflict, hatred and fear increased year after year. A new World War began – people had had enough of the fighting and arguments and wanted an end to it all.

name: Did You Hear That?
description: An adventure game where you can only use your hearing sense because the other senses are neutralized. Visually impaired can play this game

name: Dark Edges
description: Pixelart rogue-like with dice.

name: Outlier
description: OUTLIER is an adventure roguelite VR game featuring FPS and RPG elements. Control and mix various abilities, utilise an array of weapons, and explore breathtaking worlds, making for a diverse and progressive gameplay experience.

name: Three Kingdoms of MN
description: Sin descripción

name: The Drill RPG
description: Probably one of the most unique RPG stories you will ever play! Get ready for dodgy demons, opp boys and some street-crime comedy!

name: Kwarn Armada Tactics
description: KAT is a real-time tactical combat scifi game that puts you at the head of an armada of drones. Unleash the special powers of your general to overthrow the course of the battle. K.A.T will experience your tactical sense and your speed of reflexion like never before!

name: Tatarian aster
description: In this game, you control a girl who has lost her memory from a first-person perspective, and walk through a mysterious white space to recover her memory. there are three branching endings, and if you can recover all the memories, you will be able to have a good ending.

name: VR Shooting Range: Multiple Weapons
description: The VR Arcade Shooting Range Mix speed and accuracy to turn into a crazy shooting expert!

name: Cabaret 4 Card
description: A logical battle using only 4 cards. A competitive card game that rewrites victory conditions.

name: The Artifact Hunter
description: In 1920, Corporal John Eagle left the Canadian Army and embarked on his first archeological expedition. So begins the story of an artifact hunter who transforms his love of art history into profitable business.

name: Undead Can Dance
description: Undead Can Dance is a dancing battle game where you take control of the undead through rhythm, power and accuracy.

name: Curing Covid
description: Eliminate all viruses by dropping colored vitamins in this 20 level block puzzle game with a Covid-19 theme.

name: L'Onza the Bounty Hunter
description: ...take flight as the galaxy's most feared bounty hunter and tear through 60 levels of twin-stick shmup mayhem... for fans of fast-paced 2D action, bullet hells and top-down combat...

name: Fly Away Baseball
description: An exciting throwback to old school baseball games, Fly Away Baseball brings a fun and a quick pace gameplay to baseball.

name: A Day In Space
description: In this interactive exploration game you'll live a day on Space Colony, the first human space station sent to colonise Planet Omega. Carry out your daily tasks, get to know your fellow colonisers and gather the clues to unravel the mystery behind your crewmates' deaths.

name: Snake Path
description: Snake Path will drag you into a cycle of adventures in the spirit of classic arcade games. Collect fruits, avoid obstacles and enemies, grow to a huge size, compete with other players and learn all the secrets of the island!

name: Bottle Flip VR
description: Master the ancient art of bottle flipping to escape the room!

name: Foxy's Adventure
description: You must save your lover. To do this, you will have to fight against an evil monsters.You have to collect all gems and cherries in each stages. You will travel through 5 Worlds and fight against Bosses. It won't be an easy journey. So get ready for some real challenge. Good Luck little Fox!

name: Diarrhea Don
description: You only have one objective in the game and that is to poo on your unsuspecting targets. Go through the story of Don and get the message that this game sends to you.

name: Distant Transmission
description: Create nonsensical radio shows with your friends online!

name: Selini
description: Collect the lost memories of the protagonist in a vast and ruined world, filled with ancient mysteries, minimal Cycladic islands and a forgotten metropolis that holds a dark secret.

name: ClanRivals: Vikings
description: ClanRivals: Vikings is a free to play player vs. player MOBA game featuring fast paced 3v3 bloody viking battles.

name: Pro Table Tennis VR
description: Pro table tennis VR is a single-player table tennis simulation game. The game has realistic ball physics that should feel pretty close to reality. The game also features a 'pro' mode where you can turn on or off.

name: Laser Droplets
description: Laser Droplets is a mixture of shoot ‘em up, bullet-hell, arcade styled, 2D game. It consists of 16 mini stages, each with a unique stage boss.

name: Brutal Wizardry
description: Brutal Wizardry is a VR magic shooter with randomly generated levels. Use telekinesis, magical weapons and mechanisms to destroy your enemies.

name: Dungeon Display
description: Create unique RPG maps easily and effectively and then play through them with your friends!

name: Brobot
description: Manipulate gravity and avoid the hazards whilst you race to restore order to your home world. Brobot is an exciting 2.5D platformer with an FPS aesthetic.

name: Chaos of Fallen City
description: Chaos of Fallen City is a deck building game with rougelike elements. The rich characters and cards will bring infinite replay value to the game. Leading to the chaotic forbidden city, use the combination of cards and the power of talents and magic weapons to suppress this evil that is just around the corner!

name: Blue fencer Resurrection
description: The Devil's Castle has 8 stages full of powerful enemies.Invincible dash slash, powerful slash, 6 types of sub weapons.Make full use of various techniques to overcome the labyrinth !!

name: Retrowave Hexon
description: RETROWAVE style puzzle, hexagons, complex tasks, great music, lots of levels. There is something to think about.

name: Thukothea Defender
description: A strategic tower-defense where you control powerfull drones. Unlock new tower and use specific technologies to defend your base on Thukothea!

name: Pyxel Knight
description: A pixel art co-op Metroidvania-Maker game! Jump, Slash and loot enemies to earn and find badges to power up your player.

name: Beckoned
description: A Meticulously Handcrafted Epic Adventure, with a Real-Time Twist to JRPG Turn Base Combat Systems. Master the environment and challenge morale-crushing bosses with the help from majiq Loden Shards found along the way.

name: Brightblood
description: An Action Adventure where you play as Akarra, the last surviving member of the Akaii race. Grow stronger by plunging into the buried sanctums left behind by Akaii masters and proving your strength to each unique warrior that lies within.

name: Crown Land
description: In an alternate history, romance and chivalry sweep across the American continents as kings and queens wage wars for the ultimate throne. This epic visual novel features an alternate Earth fantasy, a large and complex cast, and a gripping plot that will hook you in.

name: Last Gang Standing
description: Gather up a gang of your friends, build a base, add a factory, add some turrets, add teleporters, doors, foxholes and decorations. Arm yourselves to the teeth and go forth to raze, loot and t-bag all who stand against you. Be the Last Gang Standing

name: Mori's Nightmare: Hide and seek
description: Become Mori and Avoid the scary nurse! Escape from the hospital!

name: The Death of Zoe
description: Immerse yourself in an adventure of exploration and stealth like no other in which you are Zoe, a lemur who must escape death. But it will not be easy, death itself has prepared a path full of enemies to avoid Do you dare to escape death?

name: Way of Heroes
description: You have to choose a hero and go through the dungeon levels of the city of Vorms. Collect the unworthy pages of the Book of the Dead and destroy it. Level up the hero and get new magic abilities. Play with other guys on two joysticks and have fun.

name: Post-Soviet Yandere
description: A horror game with crafting elements. A little girl needs to perform 7 magical rituals, and at the same time avoid the revenge of post-Soviet evil spirits.

name: Protocol Endfall
description: You are the captain of a space ship lost in time and space. You receive an order for delivery of a special cargo from an organization that has been considered destroyed for hundreds of years. What are your next steps?

name: Monsters, Briefcase and Road
description: Colorful bitemap, which takes place in the world of monsters. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of travel through different places of the world to achieve the goal of the hero. Destroy enemies standing in your way. And get to the truth in the game Monsters, Briefcase and Road.

name: The Loneliest Summer
description: A cinematic slice of life adventure.

name: Baby Goat Billy
description: Deckbuilding RPG with a strong narrative. Immerse yourself in an ancient world of goat mythology and fight monsters in a turn-based combat. Discover awesome deck combos, learn new skills and overcome dungeon obstacles.

name: Cardbot
description: Cardbot is an action-platformer game about traveling through dimensions to restore the world!

name: To Save Humanity From Virus
description: To Save humanity From Virus is a building game where you are on a different planet trying to get resources to create a vaccine. The virus hit the earth and the only way to save humanity is to gather resources from the different planet.

name: Edibles
description: Escape the kitchen and find yourself in an ever ending world of beauty and woes! Lots of puzzles to solve to avoid ending up either squashed, eaten blended or just thrown away in the trash! Where can a tomato find peace? What is a tomato's purpose in life? You decide!

name: Galaxy Guardian Royale
description: This game takes place in space, its classical Battle Royale mode. 50 players joining battle around solar system. Last player wins.

name: Paitan Small Town
description: Paitan small town, a place for you to enjoy the game!

name: Auto Island
description: Completely open world. Just ride your cars, overcome mountain landscapes and forests. Find new cars.

name: First Floor
description: A first person audio horror game.

name: WormJuice Skateboarding Olympics
description: WormJuice Skateboarding Olympics is the island of arcade skateboarding fun. Build & Compete in the Obstacle Arena, or fly to the finish in the speedrun track! However you get your wormcoin, you are guaranteed to have hours of fun. Full level editor with up & downloading. And hours of great music.

name: Soulbound Steel
description: Embody a necromancer and slash your way through knights and castles. Combine skills of undead warriors on the fly. Summon powerful demons and slay colossal deities in a hack n’ slash that offers a brand new combat system to be mastered.

name: Death Wish
description: Embark on an adventure as a villain who just wants to follow the script ... Die in the end for the Hero of History. Use your telekinetic powers to control elements of the scenario and defeat unworthy enemies. Do you think you can do it?

name: Arena of Ruins
description: It consists of Lan mode multiplaying and several simple acts of single mode.

name: Burrow burrow
description: Build a town in a magical but dangerous wilderness as you recruit different animal dudes and grow your community from a few weirdos around a campfire to a whole village!

name: Lord of the Click 2
description: Orcs,goblins and other evil spirits are getting closer, and very soon they will get so close that it will simply be impossible to get out of the kingdom. The king himself is ready to stop the army of dishonor. It will be difficult to determine how this battle will end if you don't help him!

name: Caste: The Secret Of Devon
description: In "Caste - The Secret Of Devon" you play an aspirant of the Water Caste, who was sent to live in Devon, a town of the Earth Caste, for at least one year. There you have to proove that you are willing to join the Water Caste.

name: Condition 24
description: Condition 24 - an epic third person open-world shooter adventure game, set in a rich tropical island setting with a complex mysterious underworld. Battle against elite special forces and the demons they protect. Coming soon to Steam.

name: Tournament Paintball VR
description: Tournament style speedball in VR focusing on realism, and fun.

name: World End Coed
description: 在河北省，核大战后孤独的世界末日，机器人守卫在尘封的考场。 长久的等待之后，全国最后一名考生探出了路口。 再过一年的六月六，高考结束之后，在这个一片荒芜的世界，两人又该何去何从……

name: Neolithic: To the End
description: A modern-day open-world RPG about a secret world. With the help of your companions, some demons, some cats, and any supernatural entities you can bend to your will, all the different ways to solve problems, you may still fail to save the world. Life is simply unfair. But, will you stop trying?

name: Field Survivor
description: Top-down zombie shooter game where you survive against hordes of zombies. Every wave the number of enemies encreases. Hey, tell me you have enough bullets, don't you?

name: Gunderdome
description: Gunderdome is an FPS Survival game. Fight endless waves of enemies to achieve the highest score. Once in the main menu you have the option to view the settings and how the game works or jump straight into the action. Choose from 3 maps to hop into and test yourself against endless waves of enemies.

name: Meteor Storm
description: Welcome back to 1996! This shared screen space shooter is the perfect 4-player competitive game for some casual fun!

name: Sisterhood
description: SISTERHOOD is a third-person shooting game that focuses on classic shooting and precision mechanics. Fight against anything that threatens humanity. Or rather, whatever the church says that threatens humanity. You play as one of the sisters, involved in special missions.

name: Handy Machines VR
description: Send the balls into the hat. You can go through the levels or create your own ways according to your ideas.

name: Walden Horde
description: You are right in the middle of political conflicts and hot war in a kingdom that draws its strength from its ruthlessness. Fight against the ruthless wizards and great warriors in the Walden Kingdom. Revolutionise the fantasy/medieval world by honing your combat and diplomacy skills!

name: See you: A brief exile
description: may this swordless adventure leads you to a peaceful new world

name: Cheese Killer
description: Cheesy Killer is a beat 'em up with the possibility of a cooperative passage in which you will constantly try to pick up coins from the corpses of enemies before your friend.

name: Droid404
description: Complete an adventurous quest while parkouring through various enemies as a robot! Leap from platform to platform while dodging obstacles in this pixelated side-scrolling platformer. Fight bosses and uncover hidden areas while discovering the truth about your existence. Good luck, Droid404.

name: Into the Midnight
description: Into the Midnight is a halloween themed co-op multiplayer survival game full of mystey and fantasy. Team up with your friends, build a base, hunt creatures and survive one more day. Gather resources to craft items and structures that prepares you to surprises.

name: Essential Mayhem
description: A casual, cartoony, money-management game set during a terrifying pandemic. Race to restock shelves before customers leave unfulfilled; all while avoiding sick people along the way.

name: FarmZone
description: The goal in FarmZone is to survive and protect your farm. You are just a farmer in the world full of zombies. You have to fight them to protect yourself and your farm. Travel the open world, explore new towns and grow your farm.

name: Malone In Nightmares
description: Malone is not a brave boy, and there is always a strange, mysterious monster lurking in the shadow of his nightmares. Tonight, Malone will have to face his nightmare. Enter the world of Malone and step into a 2D platform adventure born in the mind of a little boy.

name: Il
description: Robots invaded the earth, you have to explore their ship to eliminate them. A horror game based on an attempt to survive inside a space ship

name: Geometrix
description: Geometrix is a puzzle-platformer. You play as one of four geometric shapes to make your way through the level. Each form has it's own abilities and restrictions. There are restrictions for each level, such as a limited number of color-switches or form-switches.

name: Electrodash
description: Electrodash is a die & retry where you play as a cube that must reach the finish line by bouncing off walls strewn with obstacles.

name: Poly Gangs
description: PolyGangs: A 3-person sandbox world action game in LowPolly style. A gangster simulator in a large American city. The heater will be able to choose whether to become a felon or an undercover policeman.

name: Riot At World
description: The world is under occupation because of humans tried to colonized mars and only one city left and unfortunetly it is colonized by aliens. The last humans of world are trying to get their independence from aliens.

name: New Homestead
description: New Homestead is an online turn-based, strategy game. To build up a functional economy, you have to develop your cities and conquer your enemies on a procedurally generated map!

name: Sep's Diner
description: Welcome to Sep’s Diner, the new burger restaurant of which YOU are the Chef! Will it really become the best burger in town? It’s up to you now!

description: The ULTIMATE EDITION includes the base game THE DUNGEON OF NAHEULBEUK: THE AMULET OF CHAOS, the Season Pass of 3 DLC, a Goodies Pack and the game Soundtrack.

description: Led by Andhrímnir, the Clan of the Squirrel knows better than most how to enjoy the present moment but not at the expense of being farsighted and expert at managing resources.

description: Buy Power Naked Pack and expand your gaming experience with 5 exclusive bikes and 10 extra events.

name: Ride 4: Bonus Pack 11
description: Download the Bonus Pack 11 and expand your gaming experience with 1 new exclusive bike and 5 events.

name: Ride 4: European Bikes Pack
description: Buy the European Bikes Pack and expand your gaming experience with 2 exclusive bikes and 5 extra events.

name: Ride 4: Bonus Pack 10
description: Download the Bonus Pack 10 and expand your gaming experience with 1 new exclusive bike and 5 events.

name: Ride 4: Valencia Pack
description: Buy Valencia Pack and expand your gaming experience with 1 new track and 10 extra events.

name: Heroes of Zaruban
description: We mixed the MOBA genre and turn-based mode. Choose heroes from the list common to both players. Strengthen your squad with special items. Using the abilities of your heroes, objects and spells, destroy the Place of Strength of the enemy, taking his heroes to flight!

name: Kaiju-A-GoGo: Grey Goop
description: Update this light action-strategy game that harkens back to the classic PC monster city-stomping games of yesteryear by trying out a new and unique Kaiju - the shape-shifting Grey Goop!

name: Queerskins: A love story
description: Queerskins: a love story is a 6DoF interactive virtual reality experience. In this emotionally-charged experience, you are seated in the back seat of a photo-realistic 1986 Cadillac, behind Sebastian's parents, as they take a journey down a country road in rural Missouri. Get to know Sebastian through the drama unfolding in intimate proximity in the front seat as well as by interacting with a collection of Sebastian's personal belongings including his diary. Was he a "disgrace" like his father says or a "good man" as his mother believes?

name: The Ballad of Bonky
description: The Ballad of Bonky is a bouncy arcade adventure! Whack your enemies to shoot 'em bouncing around the room like bullets. Fight cute, evil baddies and epic bosses, solve puzzles and uncover the truth, alone or together with a friend!

name: Trident
description: Trident is a surreal adventure/action game about a seafaring adventurer, who is cursed to be a monstrous sea creature. who wakes up on a dark shore. Players use a magical Trident to fight an teleport around the terrain.

name: Snooker Loopy Pro
description: Put your expert break building skills to the test and become the World Number 1!

name: Vizzle
description: A Vizzle puzzle is based on moving video rather than a photograph. Vizzles are challenging but after the first few levels you will find that is what makes them more interesting and engaging.

name: Fate of the World: Denial
description: Denial is the mission that says: “What if we didn't have to worry about climate change?”

name: Fate of the World: Migration
description: With environmental collapse around the world, millions of Climate Refugees feel their homelands in search of a safer home.

name: GravitreX Arcade
description: This 2D physics simulation has you trying to land two ships on their respective platform. Like the old classic Lunar Lander, but much more difficult and more heavily physics based.

name: Wars Across the World: Berlin 1945
description: Berlin 1945 simulates the last major Soviet offensive to capture the capital of the German Third Reich. The Soviets must break through the last lines of defense to reach and capture Berlin, and possibly the Fuehrer with it.

name: Wars Across the World: Gulf 1990
description: Gulf 1990 describes the initial assault of Saddam Hussein's Iraqi troops against Kuwait, and the following options that follow. Irak may play for time, or else invade immediately after Saudi Arabia. The Coalition must absolutely repulse the Iraqi onslaught and remove their forces from occupied Kuwait.

name: Wars Across the World: Caesar 57
description: Caesar 57 BC, the Second Campaign of Caesar in Gaul against the valiant Belgae. The Romans must crush all the hostile tribes before end of the game, or lose it. The Belgian player must prevent the Roman goals using all its forces and opportunities.

name: Wars Across the World: Sicily 1943
description: Sicily 1943 covers the 12 weeks of the 'Husky' landings of July 1943, pitching the Anglo-American troops against Axis armies for the conquest of Sicily. The goal of the Allies is to capture completely the island.

name: Wars Across the World: Gandamak1842
description: Gandamak 1842 is a simulation of the 'First Anglo-Afghan War', a failed attempt by the British Empire to vassalize Afghanistan. The British must capture Kabul, setup their puppet ruler there and maintain themselves in the country. The Afghan must repulse the invaders, isolating their garrisons and pushing the tribes to revolt.

name: Wars Across the World: Bull Run 1861
description: Bull Run 1861 covers the first military campaign of the American Civil War. Union forces must push towards the Rebel capital of Richmond, but must keep their rear secure. The Confederate army must prevent their breakthrough while threatening Washington, head of Lincoln's government and so close to the frontlines...

name: Wars Across the World: Persia 1856
description: Persia 1856 is the conflict between the British East India Company and the Shah of Persia, the former trying to compel the latter to remove his forces from Afghanistan. The British objective consists in seizing enough strategic cities in southern Persia before European diplomatic pressure forces him to withdraw.

name: Wars Across the World: Byzantium 1116
description: Byzantium 1116 is the story of the reconquest of Anatolia by the armies of Byzantine Emperor Alexius Comnene, against the Seljuk Turks, just recently weakened by the passage of the First CrusadeIn a Hit and Run game, both sides are attempting to capture the opponent's strongholds in the highlands of central Anatolia before the latter can

name: Wars Across the World: Hastings 1066
description: Hastings 1066 is based on the conquest of England in the early Middle ages. Three players fight for the realmThe new Saxon king Harold II must hold the coastline against his two opponents: the Norman William and his army in the South, and the Vikings of Harald Hardrada landing from Norway in the North.

name: Wars Across the World: Normandy 1944
description: Normandie 1944 covers the first weeks of the gigantic 'Overlord' landings of June 6th, 1944 pitching the Anglo-American troops against Hitler's German armies. The goal of the allies is take a strong foothold on the coast of France and capture a vital supply port.

name: Wars Across the World: Estonia 1918
description: Estonia 1918 covers the Estonian war of independence after the fall of Czarist Russia in 1918. The Estonian government must hold against the Soviet menace trying to recapture former Russian imperial provinces, but also against German troops trying to annex Latvia and its neighbour with the aim to settle for long in the Baltic states...

name: Wars Across the World: Malaya 1941
description: Malaya 1941 covers the December 1941 invasion of the Malay peninsula and the air and naval campaigns around it. The Japanese forces must capture Singapore and their offensive could be well stopped by the mighty 'Prince of Wales' battleship. The British have to repulse the offensive or hold as long as they can.

name: Wars Across the World: Morat 1476
description: Morat 1476 is a two player contest, between Spring 1474 and Winter 1477, opposing the Duchy of Burgundy under Charles the Bold and the Swiss Confederation and its allies, for the control of the key heartlands in the Wars of Burgundy, at the end of the Middle Ages.

name: Wars Across the World: Korea 1950
description: Korea 1950 relates the story of one of the toughest conflict in the Cold War era, depicting the invasion of the democratic South Korea by the Northern Korea communists. The Communist must capture Seoul and possibly the whole of the peninsula.

name: Wars Across the World: Armada 1588
description: Armada 1588 is the story of the Spanish Invincible Armada created by King Philip II to crush Elizabethan England.The Spaniards must meet with their strong land forces in Flanders and then land them in England to seize London.

name: Wars Across the World: Tannenberg 1914
description: Tannenberg 1914 covers the first Russian offensive of the Great War, which aim was to relieve German pressure to the French Western front. Two Russian armies have as target the port of Königsberg and the destruction of the opposing army.

name: Wars Across the World: West Virginia 1861
description: West Virginia 1861 is the story of the events that led to the separation of pro-Union West Virginia from the secessionist state of Virginia. The Union must take a maximum number of regions to ensure that it will will the referendum, thus creating a friendly new state.

name: Wars Across the World: Kentucky 1861
description: Kentucky 1861 relates the events and campaign around the key neutral state of Kentucky at the start of the American Civil War, which led to its entry in the conflict. Both the Union and the Confederate must influence the government of Kentucky to allow their troops entry on its territory, or, better, join their side.

name: Wars Across the World: Caesar 56
description: Caesar 56BC, the Third Campaign of Caesar in Gaul in Armorica. Roman objective is to crush the Venetii fleet and capture their fortresses. The Gallic player, with his mighty fleet, must repulse the enemy and prevent the capture of his harbors.

name: Wars Across the World: Rhodesia 1972
description: Rhodesia 1972 is the story of the isolated white rule in Rhodesia, trying to establish a stable and lasting state against the black rebels supported by Communist powers. The Rebels will try to unbalance the white population's morale by infiltrating as many fighters group inside the borders as possible.

name: Wars Across the World: Congo 1964
description: Congo 1964 plunges you in the midst of the bloody Simba rebellion in eastern Congo and its crushing by the mercenaries of Marshal Mobutu. The Simbas want to control as much of the land as possible and to terrorize expatriates and civilians alike.

name: Wars Across the World: Six Days 1967
description: Six Days 1967 is a simulation of the six-days war between Israel and its Arab neighbors. Israeli forces must launch a lightning offensive to capture the Sinaï and Cisjordania before the Arab armies can become operational.

name: Wars Across the World: Mali 2012
description: Mali 2012 relates to rise of AQMI among the Tuareg rebellion and the efforts of Mali and France to counter them. The Islamic rebels must capture the urban centers of Mali and march on its capital Bamako to upset its government. Malian forces must hold till the French army shows up to the rescue, then they shall try to crush the enemy.

name: Wars Across the World: Caesar 58
description: Caesar 58BC relates the First Campaign of Caesar in Gaul. The Romans must crush decisively the Helvetian and Germanic Barbarians before they capture key cities of the Gallic allies of Caesar.

name: Wars Across the World: Koenigsberg 1945
description: Koenigsberg 1945 relates the major Soviet offensive against East Prussia in early 1945. The German player must hold at all costs against enemy onslaughts to gain enough time for his civilian population to evacuate from the last held East Prussian ports.

name: Wars Across the World: Caesar 54
description: Caesar 54BC covers the major invasion of the southern part of Britannia by Julius Caesar. The Romans must capture as many hostages as possible from the local tribes. The Britons must use all means at their disposal to prevent the success of the raid, to discourage further Roman invasions.

name: Wars Across the World: Kavkaz 1804
description: Kavkaz 1804 is the story of the conquest of the Caucasus Khanates on the Persians by the Russian imperial forces between 1804 and 1813. The Russian objective is to seize as many of these mountainous principalities with a limited but modern army.

name: Wars Across the World: Hamilkar 264
description: Hamilkar 264BC replays the First Punic War, a long land an naval war opposing the young Roman Republic to the Carthaginians, between 264 and 241 BC. The goal of the Roman Legions is to conquer the whole of Sicily, or capture Carthage.

name: Wars Across the World: Spain 1936
description: Spain 1936 relates the story of one of the toughest conflict in the pre-World War II era, depicting the Civil War that tore Spain apart from 1936 to 1939. The Nationalists must capture the whole of the peninsula, and in particular Madrid and Barcelona.

name: Wars Across the World: Saratoga 1777
description: Saratoga 1777 simulates the victory of the American Insurgents against British troops during the War of Independence, an event which led to the Kingdom of France declaration of war against Britain. The British objective is to capture Albany, using small but professional troops.

name: Wars Across the World: Austerlitz 1805
description: Austerlitz 1805 is the simulation of Emperor Napoleon's most famous campaign against the coalized Austro-Russians in 1805. The French player must crush the enemy columns in Germany and Italy before Prussia can enter the war.

name: Wars Across the World: Missouri 1861
description: Missouri 1861 sends you to the key border state of Missouri during the crucial months of May to August 1861 at the beginning of the American Civil War. The Union must keep or take all major cities before Rebel reinforcements arrive.

name: Wars Across the World: Finland 1918
description: Finland 1918 is a simulation of the tragic Finnish civil war that follosw the crumble of Czarist Russa. The Communists control the capital of Helsinki but Russian Soviet support won't last forever. Facing them, the Nationalists led by Mannerheim would love to defeat the Reds without having to resort to German support, as the latter are...

name: Way of Defector: Kim Eun-sim
description: New character Kim Eun-sim.

name: Train Simulator: LMS Stanier Mogul Steam Loco Add-On
description: Featuring a 2-6-0 wheel configuration and design elements from the GWR, Stanier's Mogul Class was a fleet of 40 strong and a key player for the railway's passenger and freight services, and thanks to the efforts of Bossman Games, it can be experienced authentically in Train Simulator.

name: The Hero Project: Open Season - Prodigal's Database for Powereds
description: Prodigal's Database for Powereds & Persons of Note will will list every relevant character by their affiliation, provide information on their Powers, and update automatically as any allegiances shift, keeping you informed from the stats screen.

name: Fate
description: Sin descripción

name: GrappleShot
description: GrappleShot is a fast-paced movement FPS about using a grappling gun used to swing around the map and gain lots of speed. Depending on the class you pick, you can have an assault rifle, shotgun, or sniper rifle, each with its own strengths and weaknesses.

name: Corona Kombat
description: Corona Kombat is part of a research program focused on the mental side effects of COVID19 and the lockdown and is used as part of treatment programs focused on COVID19 rehabilitation. The main focus is relief of stress.

name: Abyss of Death
description: Abyss of Death is an action game set in Vietnam War. As a lost soldier destroy buildings, smash bunches of enemies and get out of this hell on your own or with a friend.

name: Merchant of Phenistoria
description: Play the role of a merchant in a city full of heroes. Run your shop, sell your stuff. Will you become a skilled craftsman, a famous salesman or the man who owns a Phoenix egg? Welcome to Phenistoria!

name: Multiworld
description: Explore different worlds, Craft Weapons, start wars, co-op quests, build houses and more in Multiworld!

name: Hodl Simulator
description: Ape investors have to know when to hodl them, and know when the fodl them. But with the dark potassium pool manipulation of Monkeydel investments, this is becoming harder and harder each day. This corrupt corporation makes their living by crashing honest banana companies the only solution to HODL!

name: Gun Spartan
description: The Gun Spartan is a spectacular and dynamic action game about an agent who finds himself face to face with an international crime syndicate.

name: MindWorks
description: MindWorks is a VR kaleidoscopic audio visualizer. Create share and enjoy audio visual experiences with your friends in VR.

name: Chacal
description: Run, hit, and dodge bullets with Chacal! From the southern reaches to the capital of Argentina, achieve the best Score, and defeat the evil President Francisco to free the nation from his subjugation!

name: Defender of Kuiper Belt
description: Fight against alien invaders with your powerful spaceship. This is a bullet hell game which puts your dodging skills to a true test.

name: The Amazing Ball
description: Roll, Jump, Avoid! The Amazing Ball is a game where you are a ball and you must complete the mazes and avoid all the obstacles at all costs. Just don't get caught by the Spiky Ball!

name: Root Out
description: Come join our multiplayer garden treasure hunt! Quickly stash your trinket and then find the ones your friends hide before time runs out in this colorful backyard playground! Can you outwit your friends and come out with the top score?

name: Uplifting
description: An Action/Adventure game where your a boy in a dream world fighting off Cancer Monsters and its minions to help the boy overcome having cancer.

name: Call of Knights
description: Call of Knights is a SLG and RPG game based on the Middle Ages. Become Ruler of the World by establishing and leading a civilization: manage cities, conduct diplomacy, go head-to-head with some of history's greatest figures, and expand your empire across the map.

name: Ball Partner
description: turn-based marbles battle game。Go to all corners of the game to find various monsters, become partners with them, train them, challenge the competition and win the championship together.

name: Donutis Simulator
description: You can prepare delicious and richly decorated donuts in your donut shop by purchasing the ingredients written in the recipe. During the game, you buy new furniture in your store and provide the best comfort to your customers. Don't forget to pay the bills! Jump in your car and enjoy the fun.

name: Bake Star VR
description: Bake Star VR is a time management baking simulator. Test out how fast your hands can move and keep up with your customers.
